metadata.title: CVE-2022-48949 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:igb: Initialize mailbox message for VF resetWhen a MAC address is not assigned to the VF, that portion of the messagesent to the VF is not set. The memory, however, is allocated from thestack meaning that information may be leaked to the VM. Initialize themessage buffer to 0 so that no information is passed to the VM in thiscase.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
